    • Method Detail

      • populateLists

        public static void populateLists(java.util.List<ClientAccount> clients,
                 java.util.List<Consultant> consultants,
                 java.util.List<TimeCard> timeCards)
        Create some time card instances. Also, creates the consultants the time cards are for.
        Parameters:
        clients - the list to create the new clients in
        consultants - the list to return the new consultants in
        timeCards - the to to return the new timeCards in

      • printTimeCards

        public static void printTimeCards(java.util.List<TimeCard> timeCards,
                  java.io.PrintStream out)
        Print the time card instances.
        Parameters:
        timeCards - the time cards to print
        out - The output stream; can be System.out or a text file.
